snippet.title: ColorBlend FX: Desaturation - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Descend into the world of ColorBlend FX: Desaturation — a captivating mythical puzzle-platformer metroidvania that weaves a tale of glow, courage, and creativity. Join the Splatians, as they unite to restore the stolen essence back to their world, challenging the nefarious schemes of the dark entity, Lord Ashen.

Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/670510/ColorBlend_FX_Desaturation/ 

Follow us on:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/petersvp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/petersvp
Join Discord: https://colorblendfx.com/discord
